name: OBLIVION | bounce the line
description:
••• Addicted and new flappy style adventure ••• 

How To Play

Touch on the right side of the screen to move the ball, the more you touch ball moves fast and jump higher.Easy to play but hard to be master.


Can you bounce, twist, dart and weave your way beyond Oblivion ?

Exploding with the slightest touch or spinning off to the void below awaits your every move in this World of mayhem. Have you got the skill to avoid being destroyed, squashed, spiked or rammed to Earth ??

Put it down...I dare you !

# Get in the zone and follow the line out.

# Endless twists and turns, play forever and try to beat your friend's best score.

# Free to download right now so enter Oblivion today.

# The stages will puzzle you, be strategic in your progress through the game...this is war.

# Share your score and post to social media, zen your friends on your awesomeness !

'the great Oblivion ...the only way to survive is to bounce...absoultely epic game'

"Totally addictive...more, more, more"


'Who Dares...Bounces.' Download Oblivion Now !
